function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited capacity to protect occupants from virus transmission through surfaces and by air in existing residential buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus propagation within residential buildings.","Mitigation":"Implement surface disinfection protocols, improve ventilation systems, and promote personal hygiene practices.","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection systems, air purifiers, touchless fixtures, smart building automation for ventilation control.","People":"Residents, building management, maintenance staff, visitors.","Owner":"Building owners, property management companies."},{"Description":"Lack of service or facility to assist victims of domestic violence in existing residential buildings.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of domestic violence victims during lockdowns.","Mitigation":"Implement emergency communication systems, establish safe spaces within buildings, and provide support services for victims.","Technologies":"Emergency communication devices, security systems, counseling and support apps.","People":"Victims of domestic violence, building management, security personnel.","Owner":"Building owners, property management companies, local authorities."},{"Description":"Risk of increased energy usage and the need for sustainable energy sources due to global lockdowns.","Impact":"Increased strain on energy resources and higher environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Promote energy-efficient appliances, renewable energy sources, and energy conservation practices.","Technologies":"Smart meters, energy-efficient appliances, solar panels, energy management systems.","People":"Residents, building management, energy providers.","Owner":"Building owners, energy providers, sustainability organizations."}]}
